title: Catalog expansion, duration simplification, Messenger link, and price inquiry behavior

requirements.summary: Remove the 3 Month duration option and enforce a single 1 Month duration across product cards, cart, and WhatsApp messages.
acceptanceCriteria: Product cards no longer render a duration toggle with “3 Month”.
Cart items no longer store or display a “3 Month” duration value; the duration is always “1 Month”.
WhatsApp message generation for Buy Now/Checkout no longer includes a selectable duration beyond “1 Month”.
TypeScript types compile without union types that include “3 Month”.

file_operations.description: Update CartItem type to remove the '3 Month' union and ensure addToCart always stores duration as '1 Month' (and remove duration from cart item id composition where applicable).

Remove the duration Tabs UI and related state/logic; ensure Buy Now WhatsApp message always uses '1 Month' without offering any alternate duration. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Update Product type and product data to eliminate any '3 Month' pricing fields and ensure only a single '1 Month' pricing is represented where needed.

Update cart line item rendering and WhatsApp checkout message generation to remove any reference to '3 Month' and only include '1 Month'. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add an “Investigation / Proof (Messenger Group)” link that opens the provided Messenger join URL in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: A link labeled exactly “Investigation / Proof (Messenger Group)” is visible in the UI (e.g., Footer Quick Links section).
Clicking the link opens https://m.me/j/AbZu2osHvaTmS0WN/ in a new tab with proper rel attributes (noopener/noreferrer).

file_operations.description: Add a visible Quick Links item labeled exactly “Investigation / Proof (Messenger Group)” that opens https://m.me/j/AbZu2osHvaTmS0WN/ in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".

requirements.summary: Expand the product grid to include new services and show each one with its official logo from static generated assets.
acceptanceCriteria: All listed new services appear as cards in the product grid and are discoverable via the existing search filter.
Each new service card displays an image loaded from a static asset under /assets/generated/ and falls back to the placeholder initial if the image fails to load.
No existing products are removed from the grid unless explicitly required by other requirements.

requirements.summary: Show numeric prices only for Netflix Premium and Chess.com Diamond Membership; for all other products replace price display and purchase actions with WhatsApp inquiry via “(prize)”.
acceptanceCriteria: Only Netflix Premium and Chess.com Diamond Membership show crossed-out original price, current price, and total price values in Tk.
Spotify, YouTube Premium, and all newly added services do not display any numeric currency values anywhere on the product card (including totals).

For non-priced products, the UI shows exactly “(prize)” in the price area, styled like a link/button, and clicking it opens https://wa.me/8801326060586 in a new tab with a URL-encoded message that includes at least the product name and a “price inquiry” intent.

Non-priced products do not allow Add to Cart/Buy It Now flows that require numeric totals; if those actions remain visible, they must route to the same WhatsApp inquiry behavior without showing numeric amounts.

file_operations.description: Adjust product data/model to support two kinds of products: priced (Netflix, Chess.com) and inquiry-only (all others); ensure inquiry-only products do not require numeric price fields for rendering.

Conditionally render pricing: show numeric Tk prices (original/current/total) only for Netflix Premium and Chess.com Diamond Membership; for all other products render exactly “(prize)” in the price area and wire it to open https://wa.me/8801326060586 in a new tab with a URL-encoded inquiry message including product name and price inquiry intent; disable or reroute Add to Cart/Buy It Now to the same inquiry behavior without showing numeric amounts. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure cart interactions remain valid with the new inquiry-only behavior (e.g., prevent adding inquiry-only products to cart so cart totals remain numeric-only for priced products).

Keep cart UI and WhatsApp checkout message numeric-only by assuming cart contains only priced products; ensure no inquiry-only products can introduce hidden numeric display requirements. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Replace Chess.com product artwork with an official Chess.com logo asset and reference it consistently from product data.
acceptanceCriteria: Chess.com Diamond Membership displays the updated Chess.com logo from /assets/generated/ without broken images.
The product’s image path in the product data matches the generated filename exactly and is used by ProductCard’s rendering.
If an uploaded reference image was provided, the generated asset visually matches it (clean, logo-like, transparent/flat-friendly).
